editionStmt.edition: An electronic edition based on a text provided by Perseus Digital Library, with funding from Tufts University. Original version available for viewing and download at http://www.perseus.tufts.edu/hopper/. Edited from the edition of Wescott and Hort, 1885.

publicationStmt.publisher: The Center for Hellenic Studies of Harvard University

authority.name: Casey Dué and Mary Ebbott, edd.
